mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, B.* FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE NUM > 0 ORDER BY NUM DESC) B) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT) VALUES(NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer},TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{hit})
